sn48.50:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā aṅgesu viharati āpaṇaṃ nāma aṅgānaṃ nigamo.
sn48.50:4.3: Tatra kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi:
sn48.50:4.4: “yo so, sāriputta, ariyasāvako tathāgate ekantagato abhippasanno, na so tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā kaṅkheyya vā vicikiccheyya vā”ti?
sn48.50:5.1: “Yo so, bhante, ariyasāvako tathāgate ekantagato abhippasanno, na so tathāgate vā tathāgatasāsane vā kaṅkheyya vā vicikiccheyya vā.
sn48.50:5.2: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasāvakassa etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ yaṃ āraddhavīriyo viharissati—
sn48.50:5.3: akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
sn48.50:5.4: Yaṃ hissa, bhante, vīriyaṃ tadassa vīriyindriyaṃ.
sn48.50:6.1: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasāvakassa āraddhavīriyassa etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ yaṃ satimā bhavissati, paramena satinepakkena samannāgato, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā.
sn48.50:6.2: Yā hissa, bhante, sati tadassa satindriyaṃ.
sn48.50:7.1: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasāvakassa āraddhavīriyassa upaṭṭhitassatino etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ yaṃ vossaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā labhissati samādhiṃ, labhissati cittassa ekaggataṃ.
sn48.50:7.2: Yo hissa, bhante, samādhi tadassa samādhindriyaṃ.
sn48.50:8.1: Saddhassa hi, bhante, ariyasāvakassa āraddhavīriyassa upaṭṭhitassatino samāhitacittassa etaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ yaṃ evaṃ pajānissati—
sn48.50:8.3: Pubbakoṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
sn48.50:8.4: Avijjāya tveva tamokāyassa asesavirāganirodho santametaṃ padaṃ paṇītametaṃ padaṃ, yadidaṃ—
sn48.50:8.5: sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṃ.
sn48.50:8.6: Yā hissa, bhante, paññā tadassa paññindriyaṃ.
sn48.50:9.1: Saddho so, bhante, ariyasāvako evaṃ padahitvā padahitvā evaṃ saritvā saritvā evaṃ samādahitvā samādahitvā evaṃ pajānitvā pajānitvā evaṃ abhisaddahati:
sn48.50:9.2: ‘ime kho te dhammā ye me pubbe sutavā ahesuṃ.
sn48.50:9.3: Tenāhaṃ etarahi kāyena ca phusitvā viharāmi, paññāya ca ativijjha passāmī’ti.
sn48.50:9.4: Yā hissa, bhante, saddhā tadassa saddhindriyan”ti.
